content: I'm sorry about this, but I've just spent a couple of hours trying to apply GF#12060, and I've backed out all my changes and abandoned it. It's a massive task that breaks everything, and I've left it too late - like months late....
I can generate the profiles ok, but every tool I've got is broken by it. 200 or so places in the java code to figure out how to fix, and another 100 places or so in my server
I know it would be nice, but too hard... we'll just have to settle for coding to know that if something is an attribute, it's special. sorry
